properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.resource-server.jwt.issuer-uri
properties.description: Path where uploaded media files are stored

properties.name: spring.application.file.uploads.media-output-path
properties.description: URI for the JWT token issuer (Keycloak server).

properties.name: spring.springdoc.default-produces-media-type
properties.description: Default media type for OpenAPI documentation. This is used to set the default produces media type for all endpoints in the application.
